comments.author: loftwah
comments.snippet: I agree with the idea but it adds complexity to the application. Why not just put the configuration file in a directory that you have backing up to the cloud already?

comments.author: cpshoemake
comments.snippet: I run the whole application from a Nextcloud synced directory. Just download the .zip file, extract it into whatever cloud service you like, and run it from there.

comments.author: farosch
comments.snippet: You should also be able to link to the config file with a [hardlink](https://docs.microsoft.com/de-de/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/mklink).
